channel.title: [613/614] Development team! [613/614]
channel.description:
Okay well i decided i would like to ahost a 613/614, except there is basically nothing added at ALL. there is basically just the bank command, no teleing commands or anything else that works basically. I am looking for the following; Co-owners - Sam Lighty - (OPEN)
~~~no admins~~~
Moderators - (OPEN) - (OPEN) - (OPEN)
The application is basically as follows, please either pm me information or post it. Name - Experience - age - country - languages - Why would you like to be on this development team? -
Alright, so please do so on that, here are pics for development proof. Picture 1 [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2ilodus.png[/img] Picture 2 [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/mlr2hs.png[/img] Picture 3 [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2zsczo8.png[/img] Please apply now, to be part of one of the first development teams! please only really apply if you do have experience and can develope, don't apply just because you want to be a staff member of a 614...like please i want this to be legit good. Thanks to everyone that applys!!!!! :eek:
The official site for people that are accepted, this has been approved by Kihomura. http://revenantscape614.tk [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2m62593.png[/img]

item.title: [613/614] Development team! [613/614]

[quote=“kickyamom50, post:16, topic:356528”][quote author=laurent 248 link=topic=453063.msg3326475#msg3326475 date=1283137477]

age : u wont know it
experience : im one of ur partner server
UR experience : You leeched a 562 and a 317 for 1-2 months max.
comment : i think u wont release this server and if u release it, it wont be ur work. lol u say u release dungeoneering 65% coded by u, u added a dungeoneering npc and u tele at the other boss when u kill it? this isnt dungeoneering. And you got ::tele to work cause its already working…
And you got more players cause me its a pk only server on a 10% coded source, your server is a skilling, killing and pking server on a painzone leech. but your players dont know so u think its ok. who will donate for a stupid leech? its not ur work. and you cant port forward a d-link. so u think u can make a 614??
finally : if u release this server, it wont be ur work. u dont have the experience.

GL for this server.
[/quote]

item.title: [613/614] Development team! [613/614]
item.dc:creator: @RuneExtream RuneExtream
item.description:
@RuneExtream wrote:

My rank on these forum mean nothing..I also not asking like shit.. You and I both know that making people fix your work in a fake advertisement isn't right because this is exactly what it seems like. You cannot figure out your own 562 server so you put up a 613/614 advertisement because you know if they apply for it they must know how to some what code, so to "prove" themselves you have them fix your problems ion your 562 server. That's what this looks like to me...hence why I said what I said.

Whatever, you’re most likely just some little 9 year old, i seek the immaturity, so have fun

Please explain the immaturity you see? I highly doubt a 9 year old what have such a vocabulary to use the word “hence” I must be a genius 9 year old. Again please explain how my thinking isn’t right. I think your just trying to change the topic since I have figured out what your trying to do. You have been caught, now stop trying create a diversion with this whole “immaturity” act and if I’m wrong, prove it by giving them a different kind of task that doesn’t involve fixing your 562 server. I think that is a reasonable demand, if your not guilty of what I’m accusing you of.
